segments.text: Hi Steve . This is Mike . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , hi . I was just watching TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's nothing to watch right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I was watching a re-run . I have nothing to do and I was bored .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . Let's get together and do something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to , but I have to meet my parents in an hour for dinner . How about tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you hear the weather forecast for tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it is going to be the same as today . Clear and sunny .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We can do something outdoors then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there any special events going on tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I think there's a live outdoor concert by the river tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah . I heard about that too . Let's go check it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what time it starts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's meet for lunch at eleven thirty and afterwards , we can head over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect . I'll see you in front of the apartment at eleven thirty .
segments.speaker: S2
